title: Number of registered voters in the United States 1996 to 2018
yAxis: Number of registered voters in millions
summary: The total Number of the voters market in United States amounted to around 153.07 millions voters in the 2018 financial Year .
This is an increase of around 0.55 millions voters since 1996 .
voters voters laws Canada has complex voters laws which have developed since Prohibition in the 1920s .
gold: In 2018 , there were 153.07 million people registered to vote in the United States.
Although this was an increase from 1996 , when 127.66 million people were registered to vote , it 's lower than the peak of 157.6 million registered voters in 2016.
Voting requirements While voting laws differ from state to state , the basic requirements are the same across the entire country .
